column4: How can i use the command APT-CDROM!? I need download the iptables from CD-ROM.
i think you have to pass it the dev not the mount point
i checked the man page and is "sudo apt-cdrom -d /media/cdrom add"
this command, make what? install all packages of cdrom?
no adds the cdrom as an apt-source...
iptables is installed by default in every ubuntu computer
what cdrom are you trying to add ???
only the alternatecd works as apt source the desktop cd can not be "added"
my friend, need install packages, but haven't internet in your house...
yes; answer my question... what cdrom are you trtying to add... only the alternate cd can be "added"
